title: May Bundles, Rune Page and XP/IP Boost sale

replies.body: Riot i just bought an IP boost can i get refund {{summoner:31}}

Because this was not a pre-announced sale, if you bought it within the two weeks leading up to the start of the sale you could get a refund of the price difference. Try submitting a ticket here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new
Noo I bought a page before this {{item:3070}}

Because this was not a pre-announced sale, if you bought it within the two weeks leading up to the start of the sale you could get a refund of the price difference. Try submitting a support ticket here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new
i did too {{item:3070}}  i cri evrytim
Hey, as I mentioned, depending on the time of the purchase you may be eligible for a partial refund. Try submitting a support ticket here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new
Hey, as I mentioned, depending on the time of the purchase you may be eligible for a partial refund. Try submitting a support ticket here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new

How longs this 2 for 1 Rune Sale page on for?
